question: The lead character in the film The Bandit Queen has been played by which of the following actresses?
explanation: Bandit Queen is a 1994 Indian biographical film based on the life of Phoolan Devi as covered in the book India\'s Bandit Queen: The True Story of Phoolan Devi by the Indian author Mala Sen. It was directed by Shekhar Kapur and starred Seema Biswas as the title character.
